plot: In the final moments of his accomplished life Alan Driscol reaches out for the one experience he would never have allowed himself to have...until now.
title: Never or Now
plot_es: In the final moments of his accomplished life Alan Driscol reaches out for the one experience he would never have allowed himself to have...until now.
plot_en: In the final moments of his accomplished life Alan Driscol reaches out for the one experience he would never have allowed himself to have...until now.
